body.Summary:
Systems Engineer with 1.1 years of experience having good exposure into various domain.
Worked on Angular and Go coupled with Micro-frontend and restful web services.
Co-operative & enthusiastic team member.
Apt analytical & interpersonal skills, self-driven.

body.Career Objective: Seeking a responsible position as a Software Developer in IT Industry that enables me to continue to work in a challenging and fast-paced environment, leveraging my current knowledge and fostering creativity with many learning opportunities.

Technical Skill Grid.Tools: GIT, SonarQube, BlackDuck, Fortify, Atlassian Jira & Confluence

College.Bachelors: B.Tech in Information Technology from Techno International Newtown session 2017-21

Current Employer.Description: Worked on Angular and Go coupled with Micro-frontend and restful web services.

projects.Platform: Angular, Golang, GIT, SonarQube, BlackDuck, Fortify
projects.Project Description: Intent of the Live Engineering project is to fetch, analyze and display Developerâ€™s metrices like LOC, code churn, stories delivered with and without defects, etc., using Angular for frontend development, and Go for backend plugin development. Plugins used several ALM tools to aggregate developer analytics data and storing the data in NoSQL DB like MongoDB. Thus enabling the upper management to take data driven relevant business decisions.
projects.Responsibilities:
Responsible for development and implementation of small to medium complex components of a project module.
Responsible for development of Micro-Frontends.
Implement new enhancements in above applications as requested by the product owners.
Resolving security vulnerabilities and efficiency of code as per Fortify, BlackDuck and SonaQube.
Learning on the job towards developing domain knowledge.
Communicating and coordinating with teammates on technical and functional areas.
